name: The Clean Up Clyde Collection
description: The Clean Up Clyde Collection is a compilation of three short but challenging classic arcade style games. Each one varying from what you might find at an arcade to what you might bring home to your early 8-bit consoles. You'll be avoiding hazards, and cleaning up the town to earn the highest score!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or Equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or Equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space
